name: Meet me Halfway
description:
Repair a relationship through mini-games!

CONTROLLER IS RECOMMENDED!

WASD - Up,  Left, Down and Right
Arrow Keys - "Face Buttons", as mapped on a controller

This was originally made for Global Game Jam 2020 on the theme of "Repair". The current version is what we had after the 48 hour mark with no alterations or fixes made, so expect imperfection.

Made by:

  • Liam Allen-Miller - @RSSLiam
  • Daniel Swieca - @Wetalo
  • Angela Elliott - @holosericahime
